source.query: SELECT * FROM dbo.fSQLTables ('GLOBALMCD', null, null) WHERE TABLE_TYPE LIKE 'TABLE' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME

oracleReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Item.SchemaName}.@{pipeline().parameters.Item.TableName} VERSIONS BETWEEN TIMESTAMP TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE('@{addminutes(pipeline().parameters.Item.LastRefreshStart,-15)}','T',' '),'Z',''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE versions_operation IN ('D','U','I') AND versions_endtime IS NULL

properties.description: Connection to your Azure Data Lake Store
Access to the Oracle server through a self hosted runtime.

Integration runtime for the Glovia Server.
Runtime to connect the Netsuite ODBC to to synapse.
Data access to Pulverman Infor Visual ERP
Takes table name and key columns to remove duplicates from non-hash partitioned tables.

content.query:
DECLARE @tablname nvarchar(50)
SET @tablname = 'GLOVIA_PROD.WO'

DELETE FROM @tablename
WHERE CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) IN (SELECT id
FROM (SELECT CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) AS id,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE ORDER BY CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) AS rnum
    FROM @tablename)t
    WHERE t.rnum > 1);

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.usp_DynamicMerge
    @SchemaName NVARCHAR(25),
    @TableName NVARCHAR(50),
    @JoinStatement NVARCHAR(4000),
    @keyColumns NVARCHAR(4000),
    @keyColumnsSplit = NVARCHAR(4000)

AS  
SELECT *
FROM sys.tables

DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(4000) = 'MERGE '+ @SchemaName +'.'+ @TableName + 'AS tgt  
USING delta.' +@TableName + ' as src
    ON ' + @keyColumns + ' WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE 
    THEN DELETE
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN UPDATE SET tgt.Quantity = tgt.Quantity - src.OrderQty,
                    tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE()  
OUTPUT deleted.*, $action, inserted.* into'
GO  

EXECUTE sp_executesql   
          N'SELECT * FROM AdventureWorksPDW2012.dbo.DimEmployee   
          WHERE EmployeeKey = @level',  
          N'@level TINYINT',  
          @level = 109; 
GO

SELECT T1.ITEM, 
T1.REVISION,
T1.MAS_LOC, 
T1.LOCATION, 
T1.OH_QTY, 
T2.STD_COST, 
case  when T2.COST_METHOD like '%STD%' then T1.OH_QTY*T2.STD_COST else T1.OH_QTY*T3.AVG_COST end AS INV_VALUE, 
T3.YTD_DEP_DEM_ISS_QTY, 
T3.YTD_IND_DEM_ISS_QTY, 
T3.YTD_MFG_REC_QTY, 
T3.YTD_PI_ADJ_QTY, 
T3.YTD_PUR_RECEIPTS, 
T4.COMMODITY, 
T4.HPL, 
T2.COST_METHOD, 
T3.AVG_COST,
CAST(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time' AS DATE) RunDate
from GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM T4, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_LOC T1, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_CCN T2, 
GLOVIA_PROD.ITEM_ML T3
where T4.ITEM=T1.ITEM 
and T4.REVISION=T1.REVISION 
and T4.ITEM=T2.ITEM 
and T4.REVISION=T2.REVISION 
and T3.CCN=T1.CCN 
and T3.MAS_LOC=T1.MAS_LOC 
and T3.ITEM=T1.ITEM 
and T3.REVISION=T1.REVISION 
and T4.COMMODITY<>'C'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT 'Pulverman' AS "Location",
RECEIVABLE.CUSTOMER_ID, 
CUSTOMER.NAME, 
RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_ID, 
RECEIVABLE.TYPE, 
FORMAT(CAST(RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE AS DATE),'MM/dd/yyyy') INVOICE_DATE, 
RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT, 
RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT,
RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT - RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT AS BALANCE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_TYPE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DATE, 
RECEIVABLE.TERMS_DESCRIPTION,
RECEIVABLE.STATUS, 
RECEIVABLE.ZERO_DATE,
FORMAT(CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE),'MM/dd/yyyy') AS DueDate,
IIF(DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE)),CONVERT(DATETIME, GETUTCDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time')) IS NOT NULL,DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, CAST(DATEADD(DAY,RECEIVABLE.TERMS_NET_DAYS,RECEIVABLE.INVOICE_DATE) AS DATE)),CONVERT(DATETIME, GETUTCDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Eastern Standard Time')),0) AS "Age"
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/RECEIVABLE.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [RECEIVABLE]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/CUSTOMER.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [CUSTOMER]
) AS [CUSTOMER]
ON [RECEIVABLE].CUSTOMER_ID = [CUSTOMER].ID
WHERE [RECEIVABLE].ZERO_DATE IS NULL
AND (RECEIVABLE.TOTAL_AMOUNT - RECEIVABLE.PAID_AMOUNT) <> 0
AND [RECEIVABLE].STATUS <> 'X'
--AND [RECEIVABLE].TYPE LIKE 'U'
ORDER BY [RECEIVABLE].INVOICE_DATE

SELECT 
  ROUTINE_SCHEMA,
  ROUTINE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES
WHERE ROUTINE_TYPE = 'PROCEDURE';

SELECT TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/RECEIVABLE.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [CR]

--TODO: Make this dynamic if it works, then add this as a process to clean data after tables refresh.

DELETE T
FROM(
    SELECT *,
    DupRank = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(
        PARTITION BY CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE)
        ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)
    )
    FROM GLOVIA_PROD.WO
) AS T
WHERE DupRank > 1

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/PART/PART-Initial.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    ORDER BY [result].ROWID DESC

properties.description: Shows all of the columns in each table for Infor.

content.query:
SELECT tabl.name AS table_name,
cols.name AS column_name
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/TableList.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [Tabl]
INNER JOIN (
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/ColumnList.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [Columns]
) Cols
ON [Tabl].object_id = Cols.object_id

source:
Schema = 'GLOVIA_PROD'
Table = 'JE_DET'
FilePath = 'unified-data-cluster'
keyColumns = 'JE_CCN,JE,JE_DET,JE_LINE'
updateString=''
insertString=''

splitCols = keyColumns.split(',')
matchedString = ''
for string in splitCols:
    matchString += 'src.' + string + ' = tgt.' + string + ', '
matchedString = matchString.rstrip(', ')

dfDataOrigionalPath = f"abfss://{FilePath}@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/{Schema}/{Table}/Processed/"
dfDataChangedPath = f"abfss://{FilePath}@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/{Schema}/{Table}/NotProcessed/"
dfDataOriginal = spark.read.load(dfDataOrigionalPath, format='delta')
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable(f"delta.{Table}")
tgt = spark.table(f'delta.{Table}')
src = spark.read.format("parquet").load(dfDataChangedPath)
src.registerTempTable("changed")
import delta

#Set location of the data
loc = f"/unified-data-cluster/{sch}/{tbl}"
df = (spark
        .read
        .parquet(loc))
